original: de ni aa sht'a na n'a zhes pa n'a da'i rang bzhin cha dang bcas pa nyid ji sid cha dang bral ba'i n'a da zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de ni aa sht'a na n'a zhes pa n'a da'i rang bzhin cha dang bcas pa nyid ji sid cha dang bral ba'i n'a da zhes pa'o //

original: de ltar gyur pa'i a'a yang ye shes ta /
analyzed: de ltar gyur pa'i a'a yang ye shes ta /

analyzed: de ni gang zhig aasht'a na n'a ya zhes pa bod pa'i tshig go //

analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir ping gordhva ke sha bartma ne khyod la zhes pa ste /

analyzed: ping gordhva nyi ma'o //

original: ke sha bde ba'i dbang po zla ba ste /
analyzed: ke sha bde ba'i dbang po zla ba ste /

original: de ni ping go rdhva ke sha gang g'i bartma lam de'i ched du'o //
analyzed: de ni ping go rdhva ke sha gang g'i bartma lam de'i ched du'o //
translated: That is piṅgalordhvakeśa.

original: slar yang bod pa tsa tur bi sha ti nee tv'a ya ye shes lnga dang sku gsum gyi rang bzhin ni mkha' 'gro ma brgyad po rnams te /
analyzed: slar yang bod pa tsa tur bi sha ti nee tv'a ya ye shes lnga dang sku gsum gyi rang bzhin ni mkha' 'gro ma brgyad po rnams te /

original: de rnams kyang re re la ye shes gsum gyi bdag nyid kyis spyan nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i rang bzhin te /
analyzed: de rnams kyang re re la ye shes gsum gyi bdag nyid kyis spyan nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i rang bzhin te /

original: de nyid gang gi aa ya ye shes de bod pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid gang gi aa ya ye shes de bod pa'o //

original: de rjes sho da sha bhu dz'a ya mkha' 'gro ma brgyad po rnams shes rab dang thabs kyi rang bzhin nyid kyis bcu drug ste /
analyzed: de rjes sho da sha bhu dz'a ya mkha' 'gro ma brgyad po rnams shes rab dang thabs kyi rang bzhin nyid kyis bcu drug ste /

analyzed: stong pa nyid bcu drug rnam par dag pa sho da sha ghu dz'a'o //

original: de nyid kyi phyir a'a ya gang gi ye shes de bod pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir a'a ya gang gi ye shes de bod pa'o //

analyzed: krishna dza'i m'u ta wa pu she 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin chos kyi sku khyod kyi phyir zhes pa'o //

original: k'a p'a la m'a la a'a ne ka dh'a ri ne zhes pa mtha' yas pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin nyid kyis rnam pa thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa mtshon pa'o //🔽aadham'a ta kr'u ra tsitt'a ya zhes pa aadhm'a ta nyid kyis kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: k'a p'a la m'a la a'a ne ka dh'a ri ne zhes pa mtha' yas pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin nyid kyis rnam pa thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa mtshon pa'o // aadham'a ta kr'u ra tsitt'a ya zhes pa aadhm'a ta nyid kyis kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i bdag nyid do //

original: kr'u ra nyid kyis don dam pa'i bden pa'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: kr'u ra nyid kyis don dam pa'i bden pa'i bdag nyid do //

analyzed: gang zhig bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid can de ni tsitt'a zhes pa ste /

original: aadhm'a ta kr'u ra tsitt'a 'o //
analyzed: aadhm'a ta kr'u ra tsitt'a 'o //
translated: It is adhamākaruṇacitta.

original: de ltar gyur pa'i a'a ya gang gis ye shes de bod pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar gyur pa'i a'a ya gang gis ye shes de bod pa'o //

original: aardhva aindu dam shtra'i ne zhes pa aardhva aindu n'a da ste /
analyzed: aardhva aindu dam shtra'i ne zhes pa aardhva aindu n'a da ste /

analyzed: de nyid gang gi mche bar gyur pa de ni aardhva aandu dam shtr'i ne zhes pa ste /

analyzed: tshems bzhi bcu gsungs so //

original: zhes pa gzhan dga' ba bzhi'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: zhes pa gzhan dga' ba bzhi'i rang bzhin no //
translated: This means that it is the nature of the four joys.

analyzed: rdo rje srad bu rnams kyis brgyan //

original: srad bu aa wa dh'u t'i'o //
analyzed: srad bu aa wa dh'u t'i'o //

analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa sngar gsungs pa'i don nyid do //

analyzed: de dbus 'dab brgyad padma ni //

analyzed: 'dab brgyad ces pa mtha' yas pa'i ye shes kyis khyab pa'o //

analyzed: snying por thod pa cha gsum pa //

analyzed: 'dis zla ba dang nyi ma dag gi dbus su thod pa rdo rje 'chang gi ye shes so //

analyzed: kha dog dkar po zhes pa 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin no //

analyzed: lha mo'i kha dog dbye ba yis //
translated: By the division of the colors of the goddesses,

analyzed: phyag mtshan brgyad du rab tu grags //

analyzed: dbus su thod pa dgar po yang /

analyzed: zhes pa brgyad po rnams kyi dbus su chos 'byung ngo //
translated: In the center of those eight is a source of phenomena.

analyzed: sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa zhes pa mtshan ma sna tshogs rdo rje ste /

analyzed: rdo rje 'chang dang bdag med ma kha sbyor zhes @272b pa'i don no //

analyzed: bdag med gzhan yang med pa'o //

original: de la bdag dang gzhan rtog pa yang med do //
analyzed: de la bdag dang gzhan rtog pa yang med do //
translated: There is no conception of self and other.

original: dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: The intended meaning is that it is the very nature of the indivisibility.

original: skad cig 'di nyid ji ltar rtogs par bya zhe na gsungs pa /🔽rang gi lag pa g-yas g-yon gyi //
analyzed: skad cig 'di nyid ji ltar rtogs par bya zhe na gsungs pa / rang gi lag pa g-yas g-yon gyi //
translated: How is it realized in this very moment? It is said:🔽With the thumbs and little fingers

original: mthe bong ming med de dag gis //
analyzed: mthe bong ming med de dag gis //
translated: of the right and left hands,🔽the yogi should squeeze

original: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i rlabs gnyis su //🔽rnal 'byor pa yis btsir bar bya //
analyzed: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i rlabs gnyis su // rnal 'byor pa yis btsir bar bya //
translated: the two waves of the enjoyment wheel.

original: 'di ni rang gi lag pa dang g-yas pa dang g-yon pa yang yin pa'i phyir rang gi lag pa g-yas g-yon no //
analyzed: 'di ni rang gi lag pa dang g-yas pa dang g-yon pa yang yin pa'i phyir rang gi lag pa g-yas g-yon no //
translated: This is the right and left hand, because it is one's own hand and also right and left.

original: g-yas pa dang g-yon ba de'i gang zhig mthe bong dang ming med gang yin pa de dag gis longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lor rlabs gnyis sdom par bya'o //
analyzed: g-yas pa dang g-yon ba de'i gang zhig mthe bong dang ming med gang yin pa de dag gis longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lor rlabs gnyis sdom par bya'o //
translated: With the thumbs and little fingers of the right and left, one should bind the two waves in the enjoyment wheel.

original: rnal 'byor pa zhes pa rnal 'byor shes pa ste /
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa zhes pa rnal 'byor shes pa ste /
translated: The yogi is one who knows yoga.

original: 'dir bla ma'i gdams dag yod ba'o //
analyzed: 'dir bla ma'i gdams dag yod ba'o //
translated: Here, he has the instructions of the guru.

original: yang na gang rang zhes pa sems so //🔽gyon pa zhes pa zla pa ste /
analyzed: yang na gang rang zhes pa sems so // gyon pa zhes pa zla pa ste /
translated: Or else, the self is the mind.🔽The sun is the right hand.

original: g-yas ni nyi ma'o //
analyzed: g-yas ni nyi ma'o //
translated: The moon is the left hand.

original: 'dis zla pa dang nyi ma dang sa bon rnams te /
analyzed: 'dis zla pa dang nyi ma dang sa bon rnams te /
translated: By this, the moon, the sun, and the seed syllables are the five pristine awarenesses,

original: gcig nyid kyis bya ba grub pa'i ye shes las /
analyzed: gcig nyid kyis bya ba grub pa'i ye shes las /
translated: which are accomplished by the single gnosis of the accomplishment of activities.

original: lag pa zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes dang lhan cig ye shes lnga rnams so //
analyzed: lag pa zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes dang lhan cig ye shes lnga rnams so //
translated: The hand is the gnosis of the completely pure realm of phenomena.

original: ye shes lnga ring rang bzhin gcig pa de'i mthe bong ni gang zhig snying rje'i rang bzhin thabs kyi ye shes kun rdzob kyi bden pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes lnga ring rang bzhin gcig pa de'i mthe bong ni gang zhig snying rje'i rang bzhin thabs kyi ye shes kun rdzob kyi bden pa'o //
translated: The thumb is the relative truth, the gnosis of method, which is the nature of compassion.

original: ming med ces pa gang zhig stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin shes rab kyi ye shes don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
analyzed: ming med ces pa gang zhig stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin shes rab kyi ye shes don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
translated: The nameless is the ultimate truth, the gnosis of wisdom, which is the nature of emptiness.

original: de dag gi rlabs gnyis shugs gnyis te /
analyzed: de dag gi rlabs gnyis shugs gnyis te /
translated: The two waves of those two are the two forces.

original: bzung ba la sogs pa'i mngon par zhen pa'o //
analyzed: bzung ba la sogs pa'i mngon par zhen pa'o //
translated: They are the clinging to the apprehended and so on.

original: de btsir zhing gcig tu bya'o //
analyzed: de btsir zhing gcig tu bya'o //
translated: That should be squeezed and made into one.

original: rnal 'byor pa zhes pa zung du 'jug pa shes pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa zhes pa zung du 'jug pa shes pa'o //
translated: The yogi is one who knows the union.

original: zung du 'jug pa shes pa'i mtshan nyid gsungs pa /
analyzed: zung du 'jug pa shes pa'i mtshan nyid gsungs pa /
translated: The characteristic of knowing the union is stated:

original: longs spyod rdzogs pa zhes pa yang dag par longs spyod pa ni longs spyod rdzogs pa ste /
analyzed: longs spyod rdzogs pa zhes pa yang dag par longs spyod pa ni longs spyod rdzogs pa ste /
translated: The perfect enjoyment is the perfect enjoyment.

original: lhan cig skyes pa'i skad cig de la zhes pa'i don no //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa'i skad cig de la zhes pa'i don no //
translated: The meaning of that very moment of the innate is the meaning of that.

original: 'dis ni stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa gang yin pa de byang chub kyi sems te /
analyzed: 'dis ni stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa gang yin pa de byang chub kyi sems te /
translated: This states that the mind of enlightenment is the inseparability of emptiness and compassion.

original: de nyid ye shes lnga dang sku gsum gyi rang bzhin nyid @274b do zhes pa gsungs pa'i don no //
analyzed: de nyid ye shes lnga dang sku gsum gyi rang bzhin nyid @274b do zhes pa gsungs pa'i don no //
translated: That very [mind of enlightenment] is the nature of the five wisdoms and the three bodies.

original: yang na gang /
analyzed: yang na gang /
translated: Or else, what?

original: rang gi lags pa g-yas g-yon gyis //
analyzed: rang gi lags pa g-yas g-yon gyis //
translated: With one's own right and left

original: zhes pa lag pa g-yas pa dang g-yon pa dag gi mthe bod dang ming med gang yin pa de dag gis /
analyzed: zhes pa lag pa g-yas pa dang g-yon pa dag gi mthe bod dang ming med gang yin pa de dag gis /
translated: The meaning of the right and left hands is that whatever is between the thumb and the ring finger

original: longs spyod rdzogs pa byang chub kyi sems rdo rje nor bu'i bar du son pa'i skad cig la rlabs gnyis 'og dang steng du rnal 'byor bas btsir bar bya'o //
analyzed: longs spyod rdzogs pa byang chub kyi sems rdo rje nor bu'i bar du son pa'i skad cig la rlabs gnyis 'og dang steng du rnal 'byor bas btsir bar bya'o //
translated: The enjoyment body is the bodhicitta that has reached the jewel of the vajra. The two waves are squeezed by the yogi above and below in an instant.

original: de las bstan par gyur pa ni lhan cig skyes pa rab tu ga sal bar 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: de las bstan par gyur pa ni lhan cig skyes pa rab tu ga sal bar 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: The meaning is that the manifest innate bliss will arise from that.

original: de ltar byas pa na ci zhig 'byung bar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar byas pa na ci zhig 'byung bar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If it is asked what happens when that is done,

original: phyi nas ye shes skye bar 'gyur //
analyzed: phyi nas ye shes skye bar 'gyur //
translated: afterward, wisdom will arise.

original: gzhon nu ma yi dga' ba bzhin //
analyzed: gzhon nu ma yi dga' ba bzhin //
translated: Like the joy of a young woman,

original: phyi nas bar mchad par skye bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: phyi nas bar mchad par skye bar 'gyur te /
translated: afterward, the intermediate joy will arise.

original: lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes rab tu gsal pa mngon du byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes rab tu gsal pa mngon du byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: The manifest innate wisdom will be actualized.

original: dpe gsungs pa /
analyzed: dpe gsungs pa /
translated: The example is stated:

original: gzhon nu ma'i dga' ba bzhin nyams su myong ba med pa spyod yul ma yin pa'i don te /
analyzed: gzhon nu ma'i dga' ba bzhin nyams su myong ba med pa spyod yul ma yin pa'i don te /
translated: Like the joy of a young woman, it is not experienced, meaning it is not an object.

original: dga' ba ni bzang po'i dga' pa phul du byung ba'i bde ba'o //
analyzed: dga' ba ni bzang po'i dga' pa phul du byung ba'i bde ba'o //
translated: Joy is the excellent joy, the supreme bliss.

original: des na ye shes de ni gzhon nu ma'i nyams su myong ba de lta bu'o //
analyzed: des na ye shes de ni gzhon nu ma'i nyams su myong ba de lta bu'o //
translated: Thus, that intuition is like the experience of a young woman.

original: gzhon nu ma'i dga' ba nyid ci lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: gzhon nu ma'i dga' ba nyid ci lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is the joy of a young woman?

original: dpe'i dpe gsungs pa /
analyzed: dpe'i dpe gsungs pa /
translated: The example of an example is stated:

original: gzhon nu ma'i dga' ba de yang /
analyzed: gzhon nu ma'i dga' ba de yang /
translated: That joy of a young woman

original: de la ci yang skye 'gyur te //
analyzed: de la ci yang skye 'gyur te //
translated: arises in her, but is inexpressible,

original: lkugs pa'i rmi lam ji lta bar //
analyzed: lkugs pa'i rmi lam ji lta bar //
translated: like the dream of a mute.

original: de la zhes pa gzhon nu ma de la ci yang med pa ma ning ste /
analyzed: de la zhes pa gzhon nu ma de la ci yang med pa ma ning ste /
translated: In her means in that young woman. Inexpressible means neuter, like it and this.

original: de dang 'di zhes gang zhig yongs su dpyad par mi nu sa pa de lta bu skye bar 'gyur zhing rab tu gsal ba nyid kyis myong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dang 'di zhes gang zhig yongs su dpyad par mi nu sa pa de lta bu skye bar 'gyur zhing rab tu gsal ba nyid kyis myong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: It arises in that way, and is experienced by its own clarity, since it cannot be analyzed as to what it is.

original: de yang / lkugs pa'i rmi lam ji lta bar //
analyzed: de yang / lkugs pa'i rmi lam ji lta bar //
translated: And that is like the dream of a mute.

original: zhes pa ji ltar smra mi shes pas rmi lam du mthong ba de yang brjod par mi nus kyi rang nyid yongs su shes pa bzhin no //
analyzed: zhes pa ji ltar smra mi shes pas rmi lam du mthong ba de yang brjod par mi nus kyi rang nyid yongs su shes pa bzhin no //
translated: Just as what is seen in a dream by one who does not know how to speak cannot be expressed, but is known by himself alone.

original: 'dis ni dpe tsam nyid de ;
analyzed: 'dis ni dpe tsam nyid de ;
translated: This is merely an example.

original: gang la tshig gis nges par mi nus pa de la dpes mtshan pa'i chos brjod pas chog go zhes pa'o //
analyzed: gang la tshig gis nges par mi nus pa de la dpes mtshan pa'i chos brjod pas chog go zhes pa'o //
translated: Where words are not able to ascertain, there it is proper to express the dharma by means of an example.🔽That indivisible three vajra of self-awareness is the innate pristine awareness.

original: rang rig pa rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa de ni lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes yin ba'i phyir /
analyzed: rang rig pa rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa de ni lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes yin ba'i phyir /
translated: Therefore,

original: lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin nyid gsungs pa /
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin nyid gsungs pa /
translated: the nature of the innate is taught:

original: mchog mtha' dga' bral gyi dbus ni /
analyzed: mchog mtha' dga' bral gyi dbus ni /
translated: The middle of the supreme, the end of the separation of joy,

original: stong dang stong min he ru ka //
analyzed: stong dang stong min he ru ka //
translated: is the Heruka of emptiness and non-emptiness.

original: zhes pa mchog ni phul du byung ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa mchog ni phul du byung ba'o //
translated: Supreme is the best.

original: mtha' mi mthar gyur pa ste /
analyzed: mtha' mi mthar gyur pa ste /
translated: End is the extreme.

original: gang gi zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi zhe na /
translated: What of?

original: dga' bral gyi dbus su'o //
analyzed: dga' bral gyi dbus su'o //
translated: The middle of the separation of joy.

original: dga' 'bral gyi dbus zhes pa mtha' dga' 'bral yang chags pa dang bral pa'i ngo bor gnas pa'o //
analyzed: dga' 'bral gyi dbus zhes pa mtha' dga' 'bral yang chags pa dang bral pa'i ngo bor gnas pa'o //
translated: The middle of the separation of joy is the end of the separation of joy, which abides in the nature of the separation from attachment.

original: de ni des 'ga' mtha' nyid do //
analyzed: de ni des 'ga' mtha' nyid do //
translated: That is its end.🔽In order to dispel the doubt,

original: zhes dogs pa bsal ba'i don du dga' bral gyi dbus @275a * //🔽zhes pa ste /
analyzed: zhes dogs pa bsal ba'i don du dga' bral gyi dbus @275a * // zhes pa ste /
translated: the middle of the separation of joy is stated.

original: 'di dbus dang dga' bral yang yin pa'i phyir dbus dga' bral lo //
analyzed: 'di dbus dang dga' bral yang yin pa'i phyir dbus dga' bral lo //
translated: Since this is the middle and the separation of joy, it is the middle of the separation of joy.

original: dga' ba dang mchog dga' dag dang / lhan cig skyes pa dang / dga' bral dag go //
analyzed: dga' ba dang mchog dga' dag dang / lhan cig skyes pa dang / dga' bral dag go //
translated: The four joys are the joy and supreme joy, the connate joy, and the joy free of attachment.

original: de dag gi dbus ni chags pa dang bral pa ste /
analyzed: de dag gi dbus ni chags pa dang bral pa ste /
translated: The middle of those is free of attachment.

original: de'i mtha'o // de khyad par ci zhe na /
analyzed: de'i mtha'o // de khyad par ci zhe na /
translated: What is its limit?🔽It is said:

original: gsungs pa / stong dang stong min zhes pa stong pa ni rang bzhin dang bral ba ste de nyid stong min phal pa'i rang bzhin zhes pa'i don no //
analyzed: gsungs pa / stong dang stong min zhes pa stong pa ni rang bzhin dang bral ba ste de nyid stong min phal pa'i rang bzhin zhes pa'i don no //
translated: “Empty and not empty,” empty is free of nature, and that itself is not empty, the nature of the ordinary.

original: de gang zhe na he ru ka zhes pa ste /
analyzed: de gang zhe na he ru ka zhes pa ste /
translated: What is that? It is Heruka.

original: he zhes pa dang po rgyu dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: he zhes pa dang po rgyu dang bral ba'o //
translated: He is called “He” because he is free of a cause in the beginning.

original: ru zhes pa ru yig bkod pa dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: ru zhes pa ru yig bkod pa dang bral ba'o //
translated: He is called “Ru” because he is free of the placement of syllables.

original: ka zhes pa gang du yang mi gnas pa ste /
analyzed: ka zhes pa gang du yang mi gnas pa ste /
translated: He is called “Ka” because he does not abide anywhere.

original: rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyi rang bzhin ma ning zhes pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyi rang bzhin ma ning zhes pa'o //
translated: He is called “neutral” because he is the indivisibility of the three vajras, the nature of the three gates of liberation.

original: gal te yang /
analyzed: gal te yang /
translated: If one asks, “Why is it called ‘free of attachment’?”

original: dga' bral gyi sgra dga' ba la mi 'jug pa de ltar na yang thams cad du khyad par gyi 'dod chags nyams su myong ba'i phyir /
analyzed: dga' bral gyi sgra dga' ba la mi 'jug pa de ltar na yang thams cad du khyad par gyi 'dod chags nyams su myong ba'i phyir /
translated: Although the term “free of attachment” does not refer to joy, it is so called because the special bliss of passion is experienced in all four joys.

original: the tshom du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: the tshom du 'gyur ro //
translated: There would be doubt.

original: gzhan du na skad cig bzhi tha dad du mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: gzhan du na skad cig bzhi tha dad du mi 'gyur te /
translated: Otherwise, the four moments would not be different,🔽because there would be only one subtle nature of joy.

original: dga' ba'i rang bzhin shin tu phra mo gcig nyid yin pa'i phyir zhes dgongs pa'o //🔽yang na gang /
analyzed: dga' ba'i rang bzhin shin tu phra mo gcig nyid yin pa'i phyir zhes dgongs pa'o // yang na gang /
translated: This is the intention.

original: mchog mtha' zhes pa mchog dang de mtha' yang ste /
analyzed: mchog mtha' zhes pa mchog dang de mtha' yang ste /
translated: Or else, what is called “the end of the supreme” is the end of the supreme.

original: mchog mtha'o // gang gi zhe na dbus dang dga' bral gyi dbus mchog dga'/
analyzed: mchog mtha'o // gang gi zhe na dbus dang dga' bral gyi dbus mchog dga'/
translated: What is the end of the supreme? The middle and the end of the separation of joy are the supreme joy.

original: dbus mchog dga' dang mtha' dga' bral gyi dga' ba ste /
analyzed: dbus mchog dga' dang mtha' dga' bral gyi dga' ba ste /
translated: The middle is the supreme joy, and the end is the joy of the separation of joy.

original: mtha' dang dbus dga' dang po med pas bar ma yang ngo //
analyzed: mtha' dang dbus dga' dang po med pas bar ma yang ngo //
translated: Since there is no beginning of the joy of the middle and end, there is also no middle.

original: de la dga' ba yang yod pa'i phyir dga' gsum po gang yin pa de nyid kyi mchog mtha' lhan cig skyes ba zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de la dga' ba yang yod pa'i phyir dga' gsum po gang yin pa de nyid kyi mchog mtha' lhan cig skyes ba zhes pa'o //
translated: Since there is also joy in that, the supreme of those three joys is called the connate joy.

original: de yang lus dang ngag dang sems rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin pa nyid kyis nges par mi nus pa nyid kyi phyir gzhon nu ma'i dga' pa la sogs pa'i dpe cung zad tha snyad lhag par gnas pas nye bar bstan to //
analyzed: de yang lus dang ngag dang sems rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin pa nyid kyis nges par mi nus pa nyid kyi phyir gzhon nu ma'i dga' pa la sogs pa'i dpe cung zad tha snyad lhag par gnas pas nye bar bstan to //
translated: Moreover, since it is not possible to ascertain it by means of the domain of body, speech, and mind, it is taught by means of the example of the pleasure of a young woman, etc., which is slightly more accessible in conventional terms.

original: stong dang stong min he ru ka //
analyzed: stong dang stong min he ru ka //
translated: The emptiness and non-emptiness of Heruka

original: zhes pa gsungs pa'i don nyid do //
analyzed: zhes pa gsungs pa'i don nyid do //
translated: is the meaning of the statement.

original: kye'i rdo rje mngon par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o //
analyzed: kye'i rdo rje mngon par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o //
translated: This is the fifth chapter of the Tantra Called “The Emergence of Hevajra.”

original: kye'i rdo rje zhes pa shes rab dang thabs dbyer med pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: kye'i rdo rje zhes pa shes rab dang thabs dbyer med pa'i ye shes so //
translated: Hevajra is the gnosis of the inseparability of wisdom and means.

original: de'i mngon par 'byung pa ni rnam pa thams cad mchog dang ldan pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis yongs su grub pa rdo rje 'chang gi go 'phang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: de'i mngon par 'byung pa ni rnam pa thams cad mchog dang ldan pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis yongs su grub pa rdo rje 'chang gi go 'phang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: Its emergence is the state of Vajradhara, the perfect enlightenment, the nature of emptiness endowed with all supreme aspects, the complete accomplishment.

original: de ltar gyur pa'i zhes bya ba ni brda dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar gyur pa'i zhes bya ba ni brda dang ldan pa'o //
translated: “ Thus become” means endowed with the symbolic significance.

original: de ni le'u lnga pa ste /
analyzed: de ni le'u lnga pa ste /
translated: This is the fifth chapter.

original: lnga rnams kyis rdzogs pa'o zhes pa kye'i rdo rje'i 'grel bshad kha @275b sbyor shin tu dri ma med pa las brtag pa gnyis pa'i le'u lnga pa'o /
analyzed: lnga rnams kyis rdzogs pa'o zhes pa kye'i rdo rje'i 'grel bshad kha @275b sbyor shin tu dri ma med pa las brtag pa gnyis pa'i le'u lnga pa'o /
translated: This is the fifth chapter of the second section of the Stainless Light commentary on the Hevajra Tantra.🔽The arising of Hevajra is taught in order to demonstrate the five awarenesses and the five awarenesses that are the nature of the three bodies.

original: // / kye'i rdo rje mngon par 'byung ba ni ye shes lnga dang / sku gsum gyi rang bzhin nyid kyi ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin phyag rgya lnga po nyid bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: // / kye'i rdo rje mngon par 'byung ba ni ye shes lnga dang / sku gsum gyi rang bzhin nyid kyi ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin phyag rgya lnga po nyid bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: The five awarenesses are taught by the five symbolic gestures:

original: lha mo la ni dam 'khyud cing //🔽bolla thod par bcug nas ni //
analyzed: lha mo la ni dam 'khyud cing // bolla thod par bcug nas ni //
translated: Embracing the goddess,🔽placing the skull cup on the lap,

original: dam du ku tsa gzung mdzad de //🔽skyes pa'i mtha' ni gzhibs nas kyang //🔽tshems kyis ma mchu btsir nas ni //
analyzed: dam du ku tsa gzung mdzad de // skyes pa'i mtha' ni gzhibs nas kyang // tshems kyis ma mchu btsir nas ni //
translated: firmly holding the kuća,🔽kissing the tip of the sexual organ,

original: mchan khung sen mos rma mdzad de //
analyzed: mchan khung sen mos rma mdzad de //
translated: and scratching the armpits with the fingernails.

original: mnyam sbyor bde ba myong mdzad nas //
analyzed: mnyam sbyor bde ba myong mdzad nas //
translated: Having experienced the bliss of union,

original: phyag rgya lnga ni rnam phye ba //
analyzed: phyag rgya lnga ni rnam phye ba //
translated: the five symbolic gestures are distinguished.

original: don rab tu gsal pa nyid do //🔽yang na / lha mo ni dam 'khyud cing //
analyzed: don rab tu gsal pa nyid do // yang na / lha mo ni dam 'khyud cing //
translated: This is the clear meaning.

original: zhes pa dga' ba'i ye shes so //
analyzed: zhes pa dga' ba'i ye shes so //
translated: Or, “embracing the goddess” is the joy awareness.

original: bolla thod par bcug nas ni //
analyzed: bolla thod par bcug nas ni //
translated: Having placed the skull in the bowl,

original: zhes pa mchog dga'i ye shes so //
analyzed: zhes pa mchog dga'i ye shes so //
translated: is the pristine awareness of supreme joy.

original: dam du ku tsa gzung mdzad de //
analyzed: dam du ku tsa gzung mdzad de //
translated: Having held the kuṭa tightly,

original: zhes dga' bral khyi dga' ba'i ye shes so //
analyzed: zhes dga' bral khyi dga' ba'i ye shes so //

analyzed: phyag rgya lnga po nyid gsungs ba ; / bla ma slob dpon 'dod lha la //

original: bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa la //
analyzed: bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa la //

analyzed: smod tshig mi nyan pa yi phyir //

analyzed: rna ba dag la rna cha 'dzin //

analyzed: rna cha rnam par dag pa 'od dpag med de /

original: sngags kyi bzlas pa mgul rgyan te //
analyzed: sngags kyi bzlas pa mgul rgyan te //

analyzed: de ni tshor ba'i phung po'i rnam par dag ba ste /

original: lag pas srog chags gsod par byed de //
analyzed: lag pas srog chags gsod par byed de //

analyzed: de yang gdu bu'i phyag rgyas btab pas srog gcod pa spong ba gdu bu'i phyag @276a * //

analyzed: rgya rnam par dag pa gzugs kyi phung po'i bdag nyid can rnam par snang mdzad rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The purity of the seal of the bracelet is Vairocana, who is the nature of the aggregate of form.

original: phyag rgya bsten pa ska rags te //
analyzed: phyag rgya bsten pa ska rags te //
translated: The seal of the belt is

analyzed: 'di rtag tu nang gi phyag rgya bstan pa nyid do //

analyzed: skra rags kyi phyag rgya rnam par dag pas phyag rgya bsten pa ste /

analyzed: 'du byed kyi phung po'i bdag nyid can don yod grub pa gsungs so //

analyzed: sdud pa gsungs pa / sangs rgyas lnga yi phyag rgya yis //

analyzed: rtag tu lus la phyag rgyas gdab //

original: lus zhes pa kye'i rdo rje'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: lus zhes pa kye'i rdo rje'i rang bzhin no //

original: phyag rgyas gdab ces pa mtshan mar byed pa'o //
analyzed: phyag rgyas gdab ces pa mtshan mar byed pa'o //

original: rtag tu zhes pa rgyun du bar chad med pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: rtag tu zhes pa rgyun du bar chad med pa nyid kyis so //

original: ci zhe na mtshan ma dang phyag rgya yis so //
analyzed: ci zhe na mtshan ma dang phyag rgya yis so //

analyzed: gad gi zhe na sangs rgyas lnga'i zhes pa me long lta bu la sogs pa ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin gyi zhes pa'o //

analyzed: 'dis kye'i rdo rje mngon par 'byung ba ni rgyu brgyad dang chos nyid de /

original: chos yan lag dgu mtshon pa'o //
analyzed: chos yan lag dgu mtshon pa'o //

analyzed: de nas rab tu bzhad mdzad nas //
translated: Then, having laughed,

original: tshems kyis ma mchu btsir nas ni ;
analyzed: tshems kyis ma mchu btsir nas ni ;

original: / lhan skyes gzugs can kye'i rdo rje //
analyzed: / lhan skyes gzugs can kye'i rdo rje //

original: de la lha mo de zhus pa //
analyzed: de la lha mo de zhus pa //

analyzed: rab tu bzhad ces pa rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis drag tu bzhad pa'i sngags ha ha ha ha ha zhes pa de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i skur mdzad nas //
translated: The great laughter is the mantra ha ha ha ha ha of the yoginis' loud laughter, which they make into the body of the five Tathagatas.

original: tshems kyis ma mchu btsir nas ni //
analyzed: tshems kyis ma mchu btsir nas ni //
translated: Biting the lower lip with the teeth,

original: zhes pa sngon du bcom ldan 'das la rjes su chags par mdzad nas phyi nas rab tu bzhad ces dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa sngon du bcom ldan 'das la rjes su chags par mdzad nas phyi nas rab tu bzhad ces dgongs pa'o //

original: lha mo zhes pa spro pa'i rang bzhin te /
analyzed: lha mo zhes pa spro pa'i rang bzhin te /
translated: The goddesses are of the nature of passion.

original: kye rdo rje zhes pa gnyis ka dbyer med pa'i sku'o //
analyzed: kye rdo rje zhes pa gnyis ka dbyer med pa'i sku'o //

analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir lhan skyes gzugs can yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: Therefore, the innate form is the nature of the perfect wisdom.

original: de ci zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ci zhe na gsungs pa /

analyzed: gtso bo cho ga gang gis dang ; / de bzhin bya ba gang zhig gis //
translated: and by what action,

analyzed: kye yi rdo rje'i bris sku bya //

original: bde ba chen po bshad du gsol //
analyzed: bde ba chen po bshad du gsol //

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba //

analyzed: 'dir ni bri mkhan dam tshig can //

original: sgrub po'ang dam tshig ldan pa yis //
analyzed: sgrub po'ang dam tshig ldan pa yis //

original: bris sku 'jigs pa 'bri bar bya //
analyzed: bris sku 'jigs pa 'bri bar bya //

original: thod par gnas pa'i kha @276b dog lngas //
analyzed: thod par gnas pa'i kha @276b dog lngas //

original: ro yi skra yis por gyis ni //
analyzed: ro yi skra yis por gyis ni //

analyzed: bris sku bla ma bri bar bya // thod par gnas pa zhes pa mi'i thod par gnas pa ste /

analyzed: kha dog ldas zhes pa bdud rtsi lnga bsres pa'i kha dog lnga po rnams kyis so //

analyzed: ro yi skra zhes pa dbyangs pa'i ro'i skra'i bir gyis /

analyzed: kye'i rdo rje'i bris sku bri bar bya'o zhes pa ste /

analyzed: he ru kha phyag gnyis pa'i yang dkyil 'khor pa'i lha mo rnams ni /

analyzed: bden pa gnyis dbyer med pa nyid bden pa gnyis zhes gsungs so //

analyzed: de bri zhing bsgrub par bya'o //

analyzed: gang gis she na kha dog lngas me long lta bu la sogs pa ye shes lnga yis so //

analyzed: ji lta bus she na thod par gnas pa na yig dang ra yig dbyer med pa las kha sbyor ro //

original: de ltar gyur ba'i kam ye shes te /
analyzed: de ltar gyur ba'i kam ye shes te /

analyzed: ro'i skra zhes pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so //
translated: The “hair of the corpse” is the intuition of the reality realm.

analyzed: pir zhes pa thams cad rang bzhin gcig pa nyid kyis zhes pa'i don no //

translated: Endowed with that, one should visualize Nairātmya.

translated: From the yoga of the consecration of the commitments,

translated: at midday, with a fierce mind,

analyzed: lus la ni ram shu bsams te //

analyzed: zla ba zla ba'i zhes pa la sogs pa /

original: de nas dam tshig bza' bar bya //
analyzed: de nas dam tshig bza' bar bya //
translated: Then one should eat the pledge.

original: zhes pa'i bar gyis /
analyzed: zhes pa'i bar gyis /

analyzed: 'bri mkhan dang sgrub pa po dang skud pa dang ras yug sgrub par byed pa gsum char gyis kyang 'di bri ste /

original: @277a * // don gsal ba nyid do //
analyzed: @277a * // don gsal ba nyid do //

analyzed: yang na gang zla ba zla ba'i cha zhes pa grang ba dang bral ba'o //

analyzed: mar ngo zhes pa bdag med mar gyur pa'o //

analyzed: 'di ji ltar zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: How is this? It is said:

original: kam bde ba ste /

analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa'i gzugs can ma //

original: khong nas khro ba'i sems kyis zhes bdag nyid khor ba'i nga rgyal gyi rang bzhin zhes pa'i don no //
analyzed: khong nas khro ba'i sems kyis zhes bdag nyid khor ba'i nga rgyal gyi rang bzhin zhes pa'i don no //
translated: “With a wrathful mind” means that one should have the nature of a wrathful pride.

original: yang na gang /
analyzed: yang na gang /
translated: Or else,

original: bsgrub bya'i lte ba'i rtsa bar ni zhes pa klog pa de'i don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: bsgrub bya'i lte ba'i rtsa bar ni zhes pa klog pa de'i don ni 'di yin te /
translated: if one reads “at the navel of the victim,” the meaning is this:

original: bsgrub bya'i lte ba'i rtsa bar brtul zhugs can gyis lag pas kha sbyor dbye bar bya'o //🔽he ru ka yi rab sbyor gyis //
analyzed: bsgrub bya'i lte ba'i rtsa bar brtul zhugs can gyis lag pas kha sbyor dbye bar bya'o // he ru ka yi rab sbyor gyis //
translated: “The one who is engaged in the practice” should open the union at the navel of the victim with his hand.🔽“By the yoga of Heruka”

original: zhes pa rang nyid he ru ka'i gzugs so //🔽de bzhin du bsgrub bya yang ste /
analyzed: zhes pa rang nyid he ru ka'i gzugs so // de bzhin du bsgrub bya yang ste /
translated: means that one should make oneself into the form of Heruka.

original: de'i rnam par shes pa mi bskyod pa'i gzugs su 'pho bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: de'i rnam par shes pa mi bskyod pa'i gzugs su 'pho bar byed pa'o //
translated: In the same way, one should transfer the consciousness of the victim into the form of Akṣobhya.

original: de'i phyir gdul dka' ba rnams kyang 'dul bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir gdul dka' ba rnams kyang 'dul bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, even those who are difficult to tame will be tamed.

original: yang na bsgrub bya rdo rje 'chang gi dbye zhing spro bar bya ste rdor rje 'chang spro ba'i ngo bos rnam par gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: yang na bsgrub bya rdo rje 'chang gi dbye zhing spro bar bya ste rdor rje 'chang spro ba'i ngo bos rnam par gnas par bya'o //
translated: Or else, the object of attainment is to be divided and emitted, and one should abide in the form of emitting Vajradhara.

original: gang du zhe na /
analyzed: gang du zhe na /
translated: Where?

original: lte bar lte ba'i rtsa ba ste //
analyzed: lte bar lte ba'i rtsa ba ste //
translated: In the navel, in the root of the navel.

original: byang chub kyi sems nyid rtsa ba'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems nyid rtsa ba'o //
translated: The root is the very thought of enlightenment.

original: der brtul zhugs can kha sbyor la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: der brtul zhugs can kha sbyor la gnas pa'o //
translated: There, the one who is disciplined abides in union.

original: lag pa zhes pa zhes pa gnyis ka'i ye shes lnga yis so //
analyzed: lag pa zhes pa zhes pa gnyis ka'i ye shes lnga yis so //
translated: The hands are both, with the five intuitions.

original: khyad par ci zhe na /
analyzed: khyad par ci zhe na /
translated: What is the difference?

original: he ru ka'i rab sbyor gyis gnyis ka'i ye shes lnga he ru ka'i rnam par bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: he ru ka'i rab sbyor gyis gnyis ka'i ye shes lnga he ru ka'i rnam par bskyed pa'o //
translated: By the yoga of Heruka, the five intuitions of both are generated in the form of Heruka.

original: @282a * // de nyid kyi phyir khong nas khro ba'i sems so //
analyzed: @282a * // de nyid kyi phyir khong nas khro ba'i sems so //
translated: Therefore, he is the angry mind from within.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /🔽'di ni bsgoms pa tsam nyid kyi //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir / 'di ni bsgoms pa tsam nyid kyi //
translated: Therefore,🔽even the Buddha is certainly destroyed🔽by the mere meditation on this,

original: sangs rgyas kyang ni nges par 'jig / snyoms par 'jug pa kha sbyor nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyang zhes pa rnam par shes pa tsam yang 'jig par 'gyur te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyang ni nges par 'jig / snyoms par 'jug pa kha sbyor nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyang zhes pa rnam par shes pa tsam yang 'jig par 'gyur te /
translated: even the Buddha, that is, even consciousness only, is destroyed by the yoga of union.

original: yang dag pa ni mthong ba'i lam du 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: yang dag pa ni mthong ba'i lam du 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: It is not the path of seeing.🔽One should kill him who injures the Doctrine,

original: bstan la gnod pa byed pa dang // bla ma sangs rgyas 'jig byed pa //
analyzed: bstan la gnod pa byed pa dang // bla ma sangs rgyas 'jig byed pa //
translated: and the guru who is a destroyer of the Buddha.

original: bla ma thub pa la mnyan nas //
analyzed: bla ma thub pa la mnyan nas //
translated: Having listened to the guru Muni,

original: snying rje yis ni gsad par bya //
analyzed: snying rje yis ni gsad par bya //
translated: one should kill him out of compassion.

original: ji ltar bsgrub bya'i gzugs bltas te //
analyzed: ji ltar bsgrub bya'i gzugs bltas te //
translated: Having seen the form of the victim,

original: kha ni 'og tu rnam bsgom zhing //🔽khrag ni skyug par 'gyur ba nyid //
analyzed: kha ni 'og tu rnam bsgom zhing // khrag ni skyug par 'gyur ba nyid //
translated: one should visualize his face below,🔽and he will vomit blood.

original: 'dar zhing mgo skyes grol ba'o //🔽de yi lam du khab ni me'i //
analyzed: 'dar zhing mgo skyes grol ba'o // de yi lam du khab ni me'i //
translated: He will tremble and his hair will fall out.🔽One should imagine that a needle

original: gzugs can 'jug par bsam bya zhing //🔽snying gar byin za'i sa bon ni //
analyzed: gzugs can 'jug par bsam bya zhing // snying gar byin za'i sa bon ni //
translated: in the form of fire enters his path.🔽Having seen the seed of the gihi

original: bltas nas skad cig de la gsad //
analyzed: bltas nas skad cig de la gsad //
translated: in his heart, he will be killed instantly.

original: snying rje yis ni gsad par bya //
analyzed: snying rje yis ni gsad par bya //
translated: One should kill him out of compassion.

original: zhes pa gsad pa ni sems can la phan pa'i rgyu nyid du'o //
analyzed: zhes pa gsad pa ni sems can la phan pa'i rgyu nyid du'o //
translated: The killing is for the sake of benefiting the sentient being.

original: de'i phyir sems can la gnod pa byed pa'i skyon du mi 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don no //
analyzed: de'i phyir sems can la gnod pa byed pa'i skyon du mi 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don no //
translated: Therefore, there is no fault of harming sentient beings.

original: bla ma thub pa la mnyan nas //
analyzed: bla ma thub pa la mnyan nas //
translated: Having listened to the guru Muni,

original: zhes pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems pa'i rnams la dmyal bar 'gro ba'i sems can 'di gnod par 'tshal zhes gsol ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems pa'i rnams la dmyal bar 'gro ba'i sems can 'di gnod par 'tshal zhes gsol ba'o //
translated: Having thus requested, May these sentient beings who are going to hell be harmed,🔽 he should visualize the form of the enemy, and having visualized him, he should kill him with the mantra of Amṛtakuṇḍali, Oṁ, you with a noose, seize, seize!

original: bstan la gnod pa byed pa dang // zhes pa gzhan de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung la 'god pa'o //🔽de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: bstan la gnod pa byed pa dang // zhes pa gzhan de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung la 'god pa'o // de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: and so forth.🔽 Having thus killed him, he should offer him to the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas with the mantra, Oṁ, Śrī Heruka, accept the offering of blood and flesh, hūṁ, hūṁ, phaṭ, phaṭ, svāhā!🔽 and so forth.

original: bla ma sangs rgyas 'jig byed pa'o //
analyzed: bla ma sangs rgyas 'jig byed pa'o //
translated: Having thus offered him, he should make the following declaration: I offer this enemy to the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas.🔽 May they accept this enemy and be pleased with me!

original: gang zhig de ltar gyur pa de bltas nas snying rje nyid kyis he ru ka'i rab sbyor gyis de'i rnam par shes pa mi bskyod pa'i rigs la 'pho bar bya zhing gsad pa'i don du ji ltar bu'i gzugs bsgom par bya ste /🔽de'i gzugs ji ltar yin pa de ltar bsgom par bya zhing /
analyzed: gang zhig de ltar gyur pa de bltas nas snying rje nyid kyis he ru ka'i rab sbyor gyis de'i rnam par shes pa mi bskyod pa'i rigs la 'pho bar bya zhing gsad pa'i don du ji ltar bu'i gzugs bsgom par bya ste / de'i gzugs ji ltar yin pa de ltar bsgom par bya zhing /
translated: Having thus declared, he should visualize the form of the enemy as a corpse, and having visualized it, he should recite the mantra of Amṛtakuṇḍali, Oṁ, you with a noose, seize, seize!🔽 and so forth.🔽 Having thus recited, he should offer it to the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas with the mantra, Oṁ, Śrī Heruka, accept the offering of blood and flesh, hūṁ, hūṁ, phaṭ, phaṭ, svāhā!🔽 and so forth.

original: kha 'og tu gyur pa dang khrag skyug pa dang 'dar ba dang skra grol bar gyur pa zhes pa'o //
analyzed: kha 'og tu gyur pa dang khrag skyug pa dang 'dar ba dang skra grol bar gyur pa zhes pa'o //
translated: Having thus offered, he should make the following declaration: I offer this corpse to the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas.

original: de ltar gyur pa de yi lam //
analyzed: de ltar gyur pa de yi lam //
translated: May they accept this corpse and be pleased with me!🔽 Having thus declared, he should visualize the form of the enemy as a corpse, and having visualized it, he should recite the mantra of Amṛtakuṇḍali, Oṁ, you with a noose, seize, seize!🔽 and so forth.🔽 Having thus recited, he should offer it to the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas with the mantra, Oṁ, Śrī Heruka, accept the offering of blood and flesh, hūṁ, hūṁ, phaṭ, phaṭ, svāhā!🔽 and so forth.🔽 Having thus offered, he should make the following declaration: I offer this corpse to the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas.

original: zhes pa rdo rje'i lam du khab ni me'i gzugs can bsam par bya ste snying gar ro //
analyzed: zhes pa rdo rje'i lam du khab ni me'i gzugs can bsam par bya ste snying gar ro //
translated: One should imagine the needle in the vajra path to have the form of fire at the heart.🔽How is this?

original: 'di nyid ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: 'di nyid ji ltar zhe na /
translated: It is said:

original: gsungs pa / snying gar zhes pa bsgrub bya'i snying gar byin za me'i sa bon ram yig kha dog dmar po'o //
analyzed: gsungs pa / snying gar zhes pa bsgrub bya'i snying gar byin za me'i sa bon ram yig kha dog dmar po'o //
translated: The seed syllable of fire, the syllable raṃ, red in color, is at the heart of the victim.

original: de bltas nas de nyid khab tu bsam par bya zhes 'brel te /
analyzed: de bltas nas de nyid khab tu bsam par bya zhes 'brel te /
translated: Having seen that, one should imagine it as a needle.

original: skad cig de nyid las gsad par bya ba'o //
analyzed: skad cig de nyid las gsad par bya ba'o //
translated: One should kill the victim in that very instant.🔽Or else,

original: yang na / snying rje yis ni gsad par bya //
analyzed: yang na / snying rje yis ni gsad par bya //
translated: one should kill with compassion.

original: zhes ba rnam par shes pa'i kun @282b du rtog pa yongs su spong ba ste /
analyzed: zhes ba rnam par shes pa'i kun @282b du rtog pa yongs su spong ba ste /
translated: This is the complete abandonment of the conceptual thoughts of consciousness.

original: de nyid kun rdzob kyi bden pa ni shin tu rnam par dag par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid kun rdzob kyi bden pa ni shin tu rnam par dag par gyur pa'o //
translated: That itself is the thoroughly pure conventional truth.

original: des bya ste 'gro ba'i don bya ba la 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: des bya ste 'gro ba'i don bya ba la 'jug pa'o //
translated: One should do that, which is to engage in the welfare of living beings.

original: 'di nyid ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: 'di nyid ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How is this?

original: rnam par shes pa'i kun du rtog pa yongs su spong ba'i ye shes nyid ces pa ste /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i kun du rtog pa yongs su spong ba'i ye shes nyid ces pa ste /
translated: It is the wisdom of the complete abandonment of the conceptual thoughts of consciousness.

original: snying gar byin za'i sa bon no //
analyzed: snying gar byin za'i sa bon no //
translated: The seed syllable of fire is at the heart.

original: ba ltas nas 'jig pas de'i skad cig la gsad par bya ste /
analyzed: ba ltas nas 'jig pas de'i skad cig la gsad par bya ste /
translated: Having seen the sign, he should kill it in that moment.

original: ye shes skad cig las so //🔽'dis ni / lte bar gtum mo 'bar ba na //
analyzed: ye shes skad cig las so // 'dis ni / lte bar gtum mo 'bar ba na //
translated: From the moment of gnosis.

original: zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'i rim pa'i gdams ngag mtshon pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'i rim pa'i gdams ngag mtshon pa'o //
translated: This indicates the instruction of the sequence of the verse beginning “The fierce fire blazes at the navel,” and so on.

original: rim pa 'dis kha sbyor 'byed pa'i mtshan nyid gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin spro ba dang sdud pa'i ngo bo nyid bcom ldan 'das rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs pa ste /
analyzed: rim pa 'dis kha sbyor 'byed pa'i mtshan nyid gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin spro ba dang sdud pa'i ngo bo nyid bcom ldan 'das rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs pa ste /
translated: By this sequence, the characteristic of the separation of the union is the abandonment of all concepts and conceptual thoughts of the Bhagavān, whose nature is nonduality, the essence of emanation and withdrawal.

original: de nyid ni 'dus byas kyi dbyings la mi gnas 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings la mi gnas par bzhengs pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni 'dus byas kyi dbyings la mi gnas 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings la mi gnas par bzhengs pa'o //
translated: That very [nature] arises without abiding in the compounded realm, without abiding in the uncompounded realm.

original: kha sbyor ni rnam pa thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ste /
analyzed: kha sbyor ni rnam pa thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ste /
translated: Union is the complete and perfect enlightenment of all aspects.

original: kha sbyor 'byed pa ni gnyis ka'i mtshan nyid kha sbyor zhes pa'o //🔽rgyud 'di la ni sreg blugs med //
analyzed: kha sbyor 'byed pa ni gnyis ka'i mtshan nyid kha sbyor zhes pa'o // rgyud 'di la ni sreg blugs med //
translated: The separation of the union is the characteristic of both, called “union.”🔽In this tantra, there is no fire offering.

original: phyag rgya bcing ba'i bya ba med //
analyzed: phyag rgya bcing ba'i bya ba med //
translated: There is no activity of binding the consort.

original: sngags chen bklags pas grub pa ste //
analyzed: sngags chen bklags pas grub pa ste //
translated: Accomplishment comes from the recitation of the great mantra,

original: bsam gtan tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur //
analyzed: bsam gtan tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur //
translated: and is accomplished by mere concentration.

original: kye'i rdo rje'i rgyud 'di la sbyin sreg gi bya ba med cing phyag rgya bcing ba'i bya ba yang med de /
analyzed: kye'i rdo rje'i rgyud 'di la sbyin sreg gi bya ba med cing phyag rgya bcing ba'i bya ba yang med de /
translated: In this Hevajra Tantra, there is no rite of fire sacrifice and no rite of binding the consort.

original: sngags brjod pa nyid las 'grub cing bklags pas grub pa'i phyir /
analyzed: sngags brjod pa nyid las 'grub cing bklags pas grub pa'i phyir /
translated: Accomplishment comes from the mere recitation of the mantra and from the recitation alone.

original: de nyid kyi phyir sngags chen yang dag par rtog pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir sngags chen yang dag par rtog pa'i ye shes so //
translated: Therefore, the great mantra is the gnosis of perfect realization.

original: bsam gtan tsam gyis sems bskyed pa 'ba' zhig 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan tsam gyis sems bskyed pa 'ba' zhig 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
translated: Accomplishment is attained by mere generation of the mind of concentration.

original: gsang ba mchog ni bshad bya yis //
analyzed: gsang ba mchog ni bshad bya yis //
translated: The supreme secret will be explained,

original: nyon cig lha mo bzhin bzangs ma //
analyzed: nyon cig lha mo bzhin bzangs ma //
translated: listen, beautiful goddess!

original: srid pa spyod pa nyams dga' ba //
analyzed: srid pa spyod pa nyams dga' ba //
translated: The conduct of existence is delightful,

original: rtog med dngos grub sbyin pa po //
analyzed: rtog med dngos grub sbyin pa po //
translated: granting the nonconceptual spiritual powers.

original: 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrigs pa'i sku //
analyzed: 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrigs pa'i sku //
translated: The body blazing with a mass of flames,

original: rin chen chen po lha mo ltos //
analyzed: rin chen chen po lha mo ltos //
translated: look at the great jewel, goddess!

original: ma phug pa yi sbyor bral 'gyur //
analyzed: ma phug pa yi sbyor bral 'gyur //
translated: The unpierced one is free from union,

original: phug pas dga' ba sbyin pa po //
analyzed: phug pas dga' ba sbyin pa po //
translated: the pierced one grants the gift of joy.

original: de ltar 'khor ba rin chen ni //
analyzed: de ltar 'khor ba rin chen ni //
translated: Thus, the jewel of cyclic existence

original: 'dod pa lnga yi yon tan ldan //
analyzed: 'dod pa lnga yi yon tan ldan //
translated: Endowed with the five desirable qualities,

original: ma dag pa ni dug tu 'gro //
analyzed: ma dag pa ni dug tu 'gro //
translated: The impure becomes poison,

original: dag pa bdud rtsi lta bur 'gyur //
analyzed: dag pa bdud rtsi lta bur 'gyur //
translated: The pure becomes like nectar.

original: 'khor ba'i rnam pa he ru ka //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i rnam pa he ru ka //
translated: The aspect of cyclic existence is Heruka,

original: 'gro ba sgrol bar byed pa'i gtso //
analyzed: 'gro ba sgrol bar byed pa'i gtso //
translated: The chief liberator of the world.

original: gang gi gzugs kyis 'gyur ba nyid //
analyzed: gang gi gzugs kyis 'gyur ba nyid //
translated: In whatever form he transforms,

original: de ni nga yis bshad kyis nyon //
analyzed: de ni nga yis bshad kyis nyon //
translated: Listen to me as I explain.

original: 'dis ci gsungs na re zhig nyan thos la sogs pa rnams kyis gnyen po'i phyogs bsgoms pas byang chub mngon du byed par @283a * //
analyzed: 'dis ci gsungs na re zhig nyan thos la sogs pa rnams kyis gnyen po'i phyogs bsgoms pas byang chub mngon du byed par @283a * //
translated: What is he saying? First, the śrāvakas and so on manifest enlightenment by cultivating the side of the antidote.

original: 'gyur ro // 'di ni kye'i rdo rje'i rgyud kyi yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i ye shes kyi che ba'i bdag nyid de /
analyzed: 'gyur ro // 'di ni kye'i rdo rje'i rgyud kyi yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i ye shes kyi che ba'i bdag nyid de /
translated: This is the greatness of the gnosis of perfect complete enlightenment in the Hevajra Tantra.

original: gnyen po'i phyogs bsgom pa med par kha sbyor 'byed pas kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon par rdzogs bar byang chub pa'i ye shes su 'gyur ba'i phyir bya ba thams cad rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gnyen po'i phyogs bsgom pa med par kha sbyor 'byed pas kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon par rdzogs bar byang chub pa'i ye shes su 'gyur ba'i phyir bya ba thams cad rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Since the separation of the union without cultivating the side of the antidote also becomes the gnosis that fully and completely manifests omniscience, all activities are liberated.

original: de nyid mngon par gsal bar byed pa /
analyzed: de nyid mngon par gsal bar byed pa /
translated: That very [reality] is made manifest.

original: gsang chen mchog ni bshad bya yis //
analyzed: gsang chen mchog ni bshad bya yis //
translated: The supreme secret is to be explained.

original: srid pa sbyong ba nyams dga' ba //
analyzed: srid pa sbyong ba nyams dga' ba //
translated: The purification of existence is delightful.

original: zhes pa thams cad du gzhom du med pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa thams cad du gzhom du med pa'o //
translated: [It is] everywhere invincible.

original: de nyid kyi phyir //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir //
translated: For that very reason,

original: rtog med dngos grub sbyin pa po //
analyzed: rtog med dngos grub sbyin pa po //
translated: [it is] the bestower of the nonconceptual spiritual power.

original: zhes pa phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: zhes pa phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: [It is] the nature of the spiritual power of the great seal.

original: de nyid kyi phyir rin chen chen po lha mo bdag med ma ltos zhes pa yang dag pa'i ye shes dang yang dag pa'i lta ba'i yul phun sum tshogs pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir rin chen chen po lha mo bdag med ma ltos zhes pa yang dag pa'i ye shes dang yang dag pa'i lta ba'i yul phun sum tshogs pa'o //
translated: For that very reason, [it is] the great jewel, the goddess Nairātmya, the reliance. [It is] the perfect wisdom and the perfect view, the perfect object.

original: khyad par ci zhe na /
analyzed: khyad par ci zhe na /
translated: What is the distinction?

original: 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrigs pa thams cad kyi mig gi spyod pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrigs pa thams cad kyi mig gi spyod pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: [It is] the entire blazing garland, not the domain of the eye.

original: de ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: de ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is it like?

original: sku zhes pa gsum gyi bdag nyid can no //
analyzed: sku zhes pa gsum gyi bdag nyid can no //
translated: [It is] the body, the nature of the three [vajras].

original: de nyid rin chen chen po ste sbyor bral 'gyur /
analyzed: de nyid rin chen chen po ste sbyor bral 'gyur /
translated: That very [reality] is the great jewel, the separation from union.

original: aa bdag med ma dang sbyor ba rdo rje 'chang ste /
analyzed: aa bdag med ma dang sbyor ba rdo rje 'chang ste /
translated: A is Nairātmya, the union with Vajradhara.

original: de lta bur 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bur 'gyur ro //
translated: [It is] such.

original: ma phug pas bdag med ma mngon du gyur pas //
analyzed: ma phug pas bdag med ma mngon du gyur pas //
translated: Since the non-pierced is the actualization of Nairātmya,

original: phug pa rdo rje 'chang dga' ba sbyin pa po kun rdzob kyi bden pa yang dag pa ji lta ba'i don rtogs par byed pa'o //
analyzed: phug pa rdo rje 'chang dga' ba sbyin pa po kun rdzob kyi bden pa yang dag pa ji lta ba'i don rtogs par byed pa'o //

translated: Samsara, which is not of the nature of the realization of the suchness of impurity, should be regarded as poison, but when it becomes the nature of the suchness of purity, it becomes the perfect possession of the enlightenment spirit, which is like nectar.

translated: This means that the four elements are exclusively the nature of the five wisdoms: the earth element is flesh, the water element is blood, the fire element is semen, and the wind element is bones and fat.

original: ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid can kho na 'byung ba bzhi'o zhes pa dang / pags pa byang chub yan lag bdun //🔽zhes pa dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / chos rab tu 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /
analyzed: ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid can kho na 'byung ba bzhi'o zhes pa dang / pags pa byang chub yan lag bdun // zhes pa dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / chos rab tu 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /
translated: It also says that the skin is the seven limbs of awakening.🔽The seven limbs of awakening are the limb of awakening of correct mindfulness, the limb of awakening of correct investigation of phenomena, the limb of awakening of correct effort, the limb of awakening of correct joy, the limb of awakening of correct pliancy,

original: ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ces pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ces pa ste /
translated: the limb of awakening of correct meditative stabilization, and the limb of awakening of correct equanimity.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun rnam par dag pa pags pa dang / pags pa nyid byang chub kyi yan lag bdun zhes pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun rnam par dag pa pags pa dang / pags pa nyid byang chub kyi yan lag bdun zhes pa'o //
translated: The seven limbs of enlightenment are the skin, and the skin itself is the seven limbs of enlightenment.

original: rus pa bden pa bzhi po nyed //
analyzed: rus pa bden pa bzhi po nyed //
translated: The bones are the four truths.

original: ces pa sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba dang 'gog pa dang lam ste /
analyzed: ces pa sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba dang 'gog pa dang lam ste /
translated: The four truths are the truth of suffering, the truth of the origin of suffering, the truth of the cessation of suffering, and the truth of the path.

original: sdug bsngal shes par bya kun 'byung spang bar bya 'gog pa mngon du bya lam bsgom par bya zhes pa'o //
analyzed: sdug bsngal shes par bya kun 'byung spang bar bya 'gog pa mngon du bya lam bsgom par bya zhes pa'o //
translated: The truth of suffering is to be known, the origin of suffering is to be abandoned, the cessation of suffering is to be manifested, and the path is to be cultivated.

original: sha dang / khrag dang / khu ba dang / rkang dang / tshil dang / pags pa dang / rus pa ste /
analyzed: sha dang / khrag dang / khu ba dang / rkang dang / tshil dang / pags pa dang / rus pa ste /
translated: The seven constituents are flesh, blood, semen, marrow, fat, skin, and bones.

original: khams bdun po rnams kyis mkha' 'gro @285a * //
analyzed: khams bdun po rnams kyis mkha' 'gro @285a * //
translated: The seven constituents are the bodies of the seven dakinis.

original: ma bdun gyi sku yin zhing 'di ni shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid can kye'i rdo rje'o //
analyzed: ma bdun gyi sku yin zhing 'di ni shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid can kye'i rdo rje'o //
translated: This is Hevajra, who is the nature of wisdom and means.

original: mkha' 'gro ma lnga ni rdo rje ma la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma lnga ni rdo rje ma la sogs pa'o //
translated: The five dakinis are Vajra Woman and so forth.

original: mkha' 'gro ma gnyis ni sa spyod ma dang / mkha' spyod ma ste /
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma gnyis ni sa spyod ma dang / mkha' spyod ma ste /
translated: The two dakinis are Earth Woman and Space Woman.

original: rdo rje 'chang dang bdag med ma dbyer med pa dang brgyad ni rgyu dang bzhi nyid de /
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang dang bdag med ma dbyer med pa dang brgyad ni rgyu dang bzhi nyid de /
translated: Vajradhara and Nairatmya are inseparable, and the eight are the four causes.

original: phyi rol gyi mkha' 'gro ma brgyad dang / brgyad pa gnyis kyis bcu drug ni //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi mkha' 'gro ma brgyad dang / brgyad pa gnyis kyis bcu drug ni //
translated: The eight outer dakinis and the two eights are the sixteen.

original: phyag rnams stong nyid dag pa ste /
analyzed: phyag rnams stong nyid dag pa ste /
translated: The hands are the purity of emptiness.

original: zhes pa shin tu nges par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa shin tu nges par gyur pa'o //
translated: This is the very definite.

original: 'dis ni rdo rje rigs kyi le'ur /
analyzed: 'dis ni rdo rje rigs kyi le'ur /
translated: This is the explanation of the brief indication in the Vajra Family Chapter:

original: dngos po bsgom bya shes rab can //
analyzed: dngos po bsgom bya shes rab can //
translated: The wise one should meditate on the entity,

original: dngos po med pa'ang yongs shes pas //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'ang yongs shes pas //
translated: and also fully understand the non-entity.

original: de ldan he ru ka bsgom bya //
analyzed: de ldan he ru ka bsgom bya //
translated: Possessing that, one should meditate on Heruka.

original: dngos po med pa'ang yongs shes pas //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'ang yongs shes pas //
translated: And also fully understand the non-entity.

original: zhes pa mdor bstan pa gsungs pa'i rgyas par bshad pa'ang nges par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa mdor bstan pa gsungs pa'i rgyas par bshad pa'ang nges par gyur pa'o //
translated: This is the explanation of the brief indication in the Mantra Chapter:

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi sprul pa'i sku gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi sprul pa'i sku gsungs pa'o //
translated: The Bhagavan's emanation body spoke.

original: sngags kyi le'ur mdor bstan pa'i sngags btu ba zhus pas longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku mngon par gsal bar mdzad pa /
analyzed: sngags kyi le'ur mdor bstan pa'i sngags btu ba zhus pas longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku mngon par gsal bar mdzad pa /
translated: The request to extract the mantra in the Mantra Chapter clarifies the enjoyment body.

original: sngags btu ba ni ji ltar 'gyur //
analyzed: sngags btu ba ni ji ltar 'gyur //
translated: How does one extract the mantra?

original: gang gi sngags kyis skye bo yis //
analyzed: gang gi sngags kyis skye bo yis //
translated: By whose mantra, the people

original: las kyi dngos grub 'gyur ba nyid //
analyzed: las kyi dngos grub 'gyur ba nyid //
translated: will have the power of action.

original: bde ba chen po bshad du gsol //
analyzed: bde ba chen po bshad du gsol //
translated: Please explain the great bliss.

original: gang gi sngags kyis zhes pa a'a li k'a li n'a da'i rang bzhin gyis te /
analyzed: gang gi sngags kyis zhes pa a'a li k'a li n'a da'i rang bzhin gyis te /
translated: By whose mantra means by the nature of the vowels and consonants.

original: sngags zhes pa yid skyob par gyur pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: sngags zhes pa yid skyob par gyur pa nyid kyis so //
translated: Mantra means that which protects the mind.

original: skye bo'i zhes pa skye bo lus dang ldan pa rnams so ;
analyzed: skye bo'i zhes pa skye bo lus dang ldan pa rnams so ;
translated: The people means those who have a physical body.

original: / las kyi zhes pa las kyi lus dang ldan pa ste /
analyzed: / las kyi zhes pa las kyi lus dang ldan pa ste /
translated: Action means those who have a physical body of action.

original: skye bo las kyi lus dang ldan pa rnams kyi ched du'o /
analyzed: skye bo las kyi lus dang ldan pa rnams kyi ched du'o /
translated: For the sake of those people who have a physical body of action,

original: de rnams kyi dngos grub ni phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub kyi rang bzhin nyid thob par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi dngos grub ni phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub kyi rang bzhin nyid thob par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: their power is the attainment of the nature of the power of the great seal.

original: de'i btu ba bstan pa ji ltar 'gyur ba bshad du gsol //
analyzed: de'i btu ba bstan pa ji ltar 'gyur ba bshad du gsol //
translated: Please explain how that is to be done.

original: kye bde ba chen po rdo rje 'chang zhes zhus pa na bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can chen po rdo rje snying po gzi brjid chen pos bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: kye bde ba chen po rdo rje 'chang zhes zhus pa na bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can chen po rdo rje snying po gzi brjid chen pos bka' stsal pa /
translated: When asked, “Oh great bliss Vajradhara,” the great Bhagavān Vajrī, the great essence Vajra Tejorāja, said this:

original: sngags ni khyod la ngas bshad kyis //
analyzed: sngags ni khyod la ngas bshad kyis //
translated: The mantra I will tell you,

original: lha mo shes rab chen mo nyon //
analyzed: lha mo shes rab chen mo nyon //
translated: goddess, listen, great wisdom!

original: rdo rje can chen po zhes pa bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid can no //
analyzed: rdo rje can chen po zhes pa bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid can no //
translated: The great vajra-holder is the embodiment of the two truths.

original: snying rje nyid snying po ste /
analyzed: snying rje nyid snying po ste /
translated: Compassion is the essence,

original: de gang gis skur gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de gang gis skur gyur pa'o //
translated: and he is the one who has become the body.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gzi brjid chen po thams cad kyis mchod par 'os pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gzi brjid chen po thams cad kyis mchod par 'os pa'o //
translated: For that very reason, he is the great splendor, worthy of worship by all.

original: des gsungs pa ni thams cad kyi tshe chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba mdzad pa ste //
analyzed: des gsungs pa ni thams cad kyi tshe chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba mdzad pa ste //
translated: What he has said is that he always turns the wheel of Dharma,

original: sems can legs byas ma bsgrubs pa rnams kyis ni rtogs par mi 'gyur nyan par mi 'gyur mthong bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems can legs byas ma bsgrubs pa rnams kyis ni rtogs par mi 'gyur nyan par mi 'gyur mthong bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: but it will not be understood, heard, or seen by beings who have not accomplished good deeds.

original: lha mo nyon zhes pa kun @285b rdzob kyi bden pa'i rang bzhin te /
analyzed: lha mo nyon zhes pa kun @285b rdzob kyi bden pa'i rang bzhin te /
translated: The goddess, listen! is the nature of conventional truth.

original: shes rab chen mo nyon zhes pa don dam pa'i bden pa'i bdag nyid can no //
analyzed: shes rab chen mo nyon zhes pa don dam pa'i bden pa'i bdag nyid can no //
translated: Listen, great wisdom! is the embodiment of ultimate truth.

original: sngags ni khyod la bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: sngags ni khyod la bshad par bya'o //
translated: The mantra I will tell you.

original: sngags de yang nga zhes pa aa yig dang ham yig nyid do //
analyzed: sngags de yang nga zhes pa aa yig dang ham yig nyid do //
translated: That mantra is I and aham, the letter a and the letter ha.🔽

original: dang por rnam par snang mdzad sbyin / aushma rnams kyi bzhi pa la //
analyzed: dang por rnam par snang mdzad sbyin / aushma rnams kyi bzhi pa la //
translated: First, Vairocana, and give, the fourth of the Uṣṇīṣa

original: pukka s'is brgyan stong pas mnan //
analyzed: pukka s'is brgyan stong pas mnan //
translated: ornamented with Puka, suppressed by the void.

original: mdog dkar mthar ni sv'a h'a sbyar //
analyzed: mdog dkar mthar ni sv'a h'a sbyar //
translated: White in color, at the end, svaḥā is applied.

original: 'di ni bzlas pa 'bum gyis ni //
analyzed: 'di ni bzlas pa 'bum gyis ni //
translated: This, by a hundred thousand recitations,

original: 'gro ba rtag tu rengs par byed //
analyzed: 'gro ba rtag tu rengs par byed //
translated: always paralyzes the world.

original: dang por rnam par sang mdzad ces pa aom yig go //
analyzed: dang por rnam par sang mdzad ces pa aom yig go //
translated: First, Vairocana is the letter Oṃ.

original: de'i rjes la aushma rnams kyi bzhi pa zhes pa ha yig go //
analyzed: de'i rjes la aushma rnams kyi bzhi pa zhes pa ha yig go //
translated: After that, the fourth of the Uṣṇīṣas is the letter Ha.

original: pukka s'is brgyan pa zhes pa au yig dang sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: pukka s'is brgyan pa zhes pa au yig dang sbyor ba'o //
translated: Ornamented with Puka is the letter U.

original: stong pas mnan zhes pa stong pa thig le ste /
analyzed: stong pas mnan zhes pa stong pa thig le ste /
translated: Suppressed by the void is the void drop.

original: des mnan pa'o //
analyzed: des mnan pa'o //
translated: It is suppressed by that.

original: mdog dkar zhes pa kha dog dkar po ste mthar ni sv'a h'a sbyar zhes pa g-yo ba'i dngos po la dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: mdog dkar zhes pa kha dog dkar po ste mthar ni sv'a h'a sbyar zhes pa g-yo ba'i dngos po la dgod par bya'o //
translated: White in color is the white color. At the end, svaḥā is applied. It should be placed on the moving thing.

original: sngon du sngags 'bum zlas te /
analyzed: sngon du sngags 'bum zlas te /
translated: First, the mantra is recited a hundred thousand times.

original: de nas 'gro ba rtag tu rengs par byed do //
analyzed: de nas 'gro ba rtag tu rengs par byed do //
translated: Then, the world is always paralyzed.

original: bar ma chad pa ces dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: bar ma chad pa ces dgongs pa'o //
translated: It is intended that there is no interruption.

original: aom h'um sv'a h'a zhes pa sngags te /
analyzed: aom h'um sv'a h'a zhes pa sngags te /
translated: Oṃ hūṃ svaḥā is the mantra.

original: sngags 'dis rengs pa dang / g-yo ba med bar byed do //
analyzed: sngags 'dis rengs pa dang / g-yo ba med bar byed do //
translated: This mantra causes paralysis and immobility.

original: dang por yi ge'i bdag po bzhag / de rjes mkha' spyod ma de nas //
analyzed: dang por yi ge'i bdag po bzhag / de rjes mkha' spyod ma de nas //
translated: First, the lord of the syllable is placed, then the Sky-goer,

original: mthar ni sv'a h'a sbyar byas nas //
analyzed: mthar ni sv'a h'a sbyar byas nas //
translated: and finally, having joined svāhā,

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyang dbang du byed //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyang dbang du byed //
translated: even the Buddhas are brought under control.

original: yi ge'i bdag po aom yig ste /
analyzed: yi ge'i bdag po aom yig ste /
translated: The lord of the syllable is the syllable Oṃ.

original: de dang por byin nas /
analyzed: de dang por byin nas /
translated: Having given that first,

original: de'i rjes la mkha' spyod ma aam yig go //
analyzed: de'i rjes la mkha' spyod ma aam yig go //
translated: after that, the Sky-goer is the syllable Aṃ.

original: kha dog dmar po me tog la sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: kha dog dmar po me tog la sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: It should be applied to the flower, which is red in color.

original: khyad par ci zhe na /
analyzed: khyad par ci zhe na /
translated: What is the difference?

original: mthar sv'a h'a'o //
analyzed: mthar sv'a h'a'o //
translated: Finally, svāhā.

original: sangs rgyas kyang zhes pa me long lta bu la sogs pa ye shes lnga po rnams so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyang zhes pa me long lta bu la sogs pa ye shes lnga po rnams so //
translated: Even the Buddhas means the five intuitions such as the mirror intuition.

original: dbang du byed pa ni dbang du gyur par byed pa ste /
analyzed: dbang du byed pa ni dbang du gyur par byed pa ste /
translated: Bringing under control means bringing under power.

original: aom a'am h'a zhes pa'o //
analyzed: aom a'am h'a zhes pa'o //
translated: It is Oṃ Aṃ Hā.

original: rig byed rnams kyi dang po sbyin //
analyzed: rig byed rnams kyi dang po sbyin //
translated: The first of the Vedas is given.

original: dang po yi ni gnyis pa la //
analyzed: dang po yi ni gnyis pa la //
translated: The first of the first

original: stong bcas mthar ni sv'a h'a sbyar //
analyzed: stong bcas mthar ni sv'a h'a sbyar //
translated: is joined to the end with the void, svāhā.

original: sangs rgyas kyang skrod shes rab can //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyang skrod shes rab can //
translated: Even the Buddhas are expelled by the wise one.

original: rig byed rnams kyi dang po aom yig go //
analyzed: rig byed rnams kyi dang po aom yig go //
translated: The first letter of the Vedas is the syllable Om.

original: de byin te phyi nas dang po'i gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: de byin te phyi nas dang po'i gnyis pa'o //
translated: Having given that, the second of the first [is given].

original: khyad par ci zhe na /
analyzed: khyad par ci zhe na /
translated: What is the difference?

original: stong bcas kham yig du ba'i mdog ste /
analyzed: stong bcas kham yig du ba'i mdog ste /
translated: The letter KHa with the anusvāra is the color of smoke.

original: gang zhig bskrad par bya ba de 'am gnas la sbyar bar bya zhing mthar sv'a h'a'o //
analyzed: gang zhig bskrad par bya ba de 'am gnas la sbyar bar bya zhing mthar sv'a h'a'o //
translated: That which is to be expelled is applied to the place, and at the end, [there is] svāhā.

original: 'dis sangs rgyas rnams kyang skrod par byed de me long lta bu la sogs pa ye shes lnga po rnams yang skrod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dis sangs rgyas rnams kyang skrod par byed de me long lta bu la sogs pa ye shes lnga po rnams yang skrod par 'gyur ro //
translated: By this, even the Buddhas are expelled, and the five wisdoms such as the mirror-like [wisdom] are expelled.

original: aom kham sv'a h'a skrod par byed ces pa spro ba'o //
analyzed: aom kham sv'a h'a skrod par byed ces pa spro ba'o //
translated: Om KHaṃ svāhā is the emission.

original: dang por rnam par snang mdzad sbyin //
analyzed: dang por rnam par snang mdzad sbyin //
translated: First, [there is] Vairocana.

original: gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa la /
analyzed: gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa la /
translated: The third of the second

original: ra dang ldan zhing chu mas brgyan //
analyzed: ra dang ldan zhing chu mas brgyan //
translated: is endowed with Ra and adorned with the water [element].

original: stong bcas @286a * //
analyzed: stong bcas @286a * //
translated: With the anusvāra,

original: mthar ni sv'a h'a sbyar //
analyzed: mthar ni sv'a h'a sbyar //
translated: at the end, [there is] svāhā.

original: mi rnams thams cad 'byed par byed //
analyzed: mi rnams thams cad 'byed par byed //
translated: It divides all people.

original: dang por rnam par snang mdzad ces pa aom yig go //
analyzed: dang por rnam par snang mdzad ces pa aom yig go //

original: gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa zhes pa dza yig go //
analyzed: gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa zhes pa dza yig go //
translated: The third of the second [is] the syllable Ja.

original: khyad par ci zhe na /
analyzed: khyad par ci zhe na /
translated: What is the difference?

original: ra dang ldan zhing chu mas brgyan //
analyzed: ra dang ldan zhing chu mas brgyan //
translated: and the letter ra, and is adorned with the letter i.

original: zhes pa ai yig dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ai yig dang ldan pa'o //
translated: This is the letter i.

original: stong bcas zhes pa thig le dang ldan pa ste /
analyzed: stong bcas zhes pa thig le dang ldan pa ste /
translated: Together with the dot means together with the bindu.

original: mthar sv'a h'a'o //
analyzed: mthar sv'a h'a'o //

original: de'i phyir mi rnams thams cad 'byed par byed /
analyzed: de'i phyir mi rnams thams cad 'byed par byed /

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zhe sdang mi bskyod pa nyid kyis rnam par gnas par bya'o //

original: aom dzrim sv'a h'a zhes pa'o //
analyzed: aom dzrim sv'a h'a zhes pa'o //
translated: Om jrim svaha.

original: dang por yi ge'i dbang phyug gzhag /
analyzed: dang por yi ge'i dbang phyug gzhag /
translated: First, place the lord of letters,

original: lnga pa yi ni gsum pa la //
analyzed: lnga pa yi ni gsum pa la //
translated: the third of the fifth,

original: stong bcas mkha' 'gro ma dang ldan //
analyzed: stong bcas mkha' 'gro ma dang ldan //
translated: together with the dot, endowed with dakini,

original: mthar ni sv'a h'a mngon spyod che //
analyzed: mthar ni sv'a h'a mngon spyod che //

analyzed: dang por yi ge'i dbang phyug ces pa thog mar aom yig byin te /
translated: First, the lord of letters means bestowing the letter om at the beginning.

original: lnga pa'i gsum pa ba yig go //
analyzed: lnga pa'i gsum pa ba yig go //

analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma dang ldan zhes pa au yig dang ldan pa'o //
